info:
he a.k.a Lain Trzaska (born 20 June 1983 in Krakow, Poland) is a multi-instrumentalist, chiptune artist and producer. Currently residing in Sweden, Lain was born in Poland where he learned to play piano at a very early age. In 1997 he began to take his melodymaking knowledge from the piano to the computer. He is also known for his unusual art designs, his use of music trackers and Nine Inch Nails Remixes.

He is signed to the Pony Canyon label and recently released his new album orion.

He is also the composer for a Dalton Harpe movie: 12 FI OZ.
